events.comment:
Hello! Welcome to the magic inside Guess the Pixel!

Here's a simple guide of what these groups are for:

Canvas (Orange)
➥ Draw - Draws pixels with the color selected to the canvas
➥ Select Color - Selects the color from the palette object

UI (Lime)
➥Player List - This is where the player list are created with their scores
➥Always running - This is where actions that are runned every frame like background parallex

Chat (Blue)
➥Handles the sending of messages and guessing the words

Game Events (Purple)
➥Pick a drawer and words - This is where a player gets picked a drawer and sends the choosen word to the other clients
➥Timer - This is where the timer or the drawing time change
➥Results - When the drawing time is over, this will run and calculate the scores and add it to their total score

P2P Handler (Red)
➥ Disconnection - Removes the disconnected player from the player list and updates the player list (also sends a leave message)
➥ Received data - This is where recieved P2P events are being taken care of
Checks whether the message contains the guessed word
If all players have drawn, it will reset the loop
Conditions for the result to come out

parameters: "[b]The word was: " + VariableString(guessedWord) + NewLine() + "[size=15]Time is up!"

events.comment: Picks another new drawer after result is shown
Note: The comments describes which event groups that the P2P event came from
Game Events > Pick a drawer and words
